li.a: Pay For It - How to add students
Pay For It - New Guardian Account

div.p:
Remote Learning started March 16, 2020. Our teaching staff is using several ways to communicate with students. Please see resources below.
1. Parent Assistance with GoogleClassroom
2. Student Assistance with Google Classroom
3.Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about our Remote Learning environment
4. Superintendent's Community Messages:
March 16th Community Update - Initial Remote Learning Plan
March 25th Community Update
March 27th Community Update - 2nd Phase - Detailed
April 2nd Community Update - Academic Plan Modifications
5. Parent Video Conferencing Waiver
6.Comprehensive COVID19 Response Plan
7.NJDOE Checklist for Emergency Preparedness Plans
8. School Breakfast/Lunch Eligibility Information
